function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Skepticism and concern regarding virus transmission in public spaces","Impact":"Reduced park visitation, potential for disease transmission","Mitigation":"Education on safety measures, transparent communication on park safety","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, signage, digital communication","People":"General population, frequent park visitors, sporadic park users","Owner":"Public health authorities, park management"},{"Description":"Increase in park visitation from past park visitors","Impact":"Potential for higher density in parks, increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regulation of park capacity, promotion of off-peak hours, enforcement of physical distancing guidelines","Technologies":"Park occupancy monitoring, digital reservation system, social distancing apps","People":"General population, frequent and sporadic park users","Owner":"Park management, local authorities"},{"Description":"Limited access to parks for lower-income individuals","Impact":"Reduced access to outdoor recreation, health disparities, increased risk of isolation","Mitigation":"Equitable access initiatives, subsidized transportation to parks, outreach to underserved communities","Technologies":"Mobile outreach apps, transportation booking platforms, social media outreach","People":"Lower-income individuals, underserved communities","Owner":"Community organizations, local authorities"}]}
